item.title: 华尔街大跌后期指上扬；经济数据值得期待
item.description: 美国股指期货周三走高，投资者正在等待一系列就业数据和美联储最近一次会议的纪要，此前一天，对持续物价压力的担忧引发了华尔街的谨慎情绪。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Wednesday, with investors awaiting a set of employment figures and minutes from the Federal Reserve's latest meeting, a day after worries of persistent price pressures sparked caution on Wall Street.】

item.title: 英国监管机构称可能接受 350 亿美元 Synopsys-Ansys 交易中的补救措施
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周三表示，可能会接受芯片设计软件制造商 Synopsys 以 350 亿美元收购 Ansys 公司的交易双方提出的补救措施。【原文：The UK's competition regulator said on Wednesday that it might accept remedies offered by the parties in chip design software maker Synopsys' $35 billion acquisition of Ansys .】

item.title: 早间竞标：债券闪红，"期限溢价 "创 10 年新高
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要可能开始显示进一步降息的障碍
item.description: 美联储官员一直表示，鉴于通胀进展放缓和美国经济依然强劲，进一步降息暂时搁置，但该央行 12 月份会议的纪要可能会显示，面对特朗普政府上台后新出现的不确定经济环境，决策者们对这一观点的认同程度有多深。【原文：Federal Reserve officials have been signaling that further interest rate cuts are on hold for now given slowed progress on inflation and a still-strong U.S. economy, but minutes from the central bank's December meeting may show just how deeply that sentiment is shared among policymakers facing a newly uncertain economic environment under the incoming Trump administration.】

item.title: 圭亚那石油出口猛增，2024 年将获得欧洲市场份额
item.description: 根据贸易商和金融公司 LSEG 的航运数据，圭亚那的石油出口量去年增长了 54%，达到约 58.2 万桶/日，这主要得益于欧洲炼油商对易于加工的甜原油的需求，以取代部分中东原油。【原文：Guyana's oil exports rose 54% last year to some 582,000 barrels per day (bpd), fueled by European refiners' demand for easy-to-process sweet crudes to replace some Middle Eastern grades, according to traders and shipping data from financial firm LSEG.】

item.title: 最高法院即将采取行动，TikTok 的命运令特朗普和共和党同僚产生分歧
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）要求最高法院阻止美国即将对 TikTok 实施的禁令，这一重大案件将于本周五进行辩论。【原文：While President-elect Donald Trump has asked the Supreme Court to block a looming U.S. ban on TikTok in a major case being argued on Friday that pits free speech rights against national security concerns over the Chinese-owned short-video app, many of his Republican allies have urged the opposite.】

item.title: 经济大臣称日本的 Seven & i 交易与国家安全有关
item.description: 日本经济大臣赤泽亮世周三表示，他认为外资可能收购零售巨头 Seven & i 是一个与国家安全 "密切相关 "的问题。【原文：Japanese economy minister Ryosei Akazawa said on Wednesday he believed a potential foreign acquisition of retail giant Seven & i was a matter "heavily related" to national security.】

item.title: 欧洲央行：欧元区家庭可能继续储蓄以重建财富
item.description: 欧洲中央银行认为，欧元区家庭可以继续将大部分收入储蓄起来，以重建因高通胀而损失的财富。【原文：Euro zone households could keep saving a large portion of their income to rebuild wealth lost to high inflation, the European Central Bank argued, suggesting lacklustre consumption will continue to weigh on growth in the near term.】

item.title: 日本消费者情绪恶化，加息时机存疑
item.description: 日本政府的一项调查周三显示，日本 12 月份的消费者情绪有所恶化，这使人们对日本央行关于稳健的家庭支出将支撑经济并成为加息理由的观点产生了怀疑。【原文：Japan's consumer sentiment deteriorated in December, a government survey showed on Wednesday, casting doubt on the central bank's view that solid household spending will underpin the economy and justify a rise in interest rates.】

item.title: 欧洲股市寸步难行，医疗保健和金融股上涨
item.description: 周三，欧洲股市在权重医疗保健股和金融股的带动下小幅上扬，而新年全球货币政策走势仍是市场关注的焦点。【原文：European shares advanced slightly on Wednesday, led by heavyweight healthcare and financial stocks, while focus remained on the global monetary policy trend in the New Year.】

item.title: 据当地报纸报道，大众汽车公司经理将合计减薪 3 亿欧元
item.description: 大众汽车人力资源董事会成员贡纳尔-基利安（Gunnar Kilian）周三向当地报纸《不伦瑞克日报》（Braunschweiger Zeitung）发表评论称，到 2030 年，大众汽车管理层的减薪总额将超过 3 亿欧元（约合 3.1008 亿美元）。【原文：Volkswagen's management will take pay cuts adding up to over 300 million euros ($310.08 million) by 2030, according to comments by VW human resources board member Gunnar Kilian to local paper Braunschweiger Zeitung published on Wednesday.】

item.title: 壳牌下调第四季度液化天然气产量预期
item.description: 壳牌周三下调了第四季度液化天然气产量预期，并表示其化学品和石油产品部门的贸易业绩预计将大大低于第三季度。【原文：Shell on Wednesday trimmed its LNG production outlook for the fourth quarter and said trading results for its chemicals and oil products division are expected to be significantly lower than in the third quarter.】

item.title: 罗氏将以 15 亿美元完成对美国生物制药公司 Poseida 的收购
item.description: 罗氏公司周三表示，计划完成对美国生物制药公司 Poseida Therapeutics 的收购，该公司是治疗多种类型血癌的复杂免疫细胞疗法专家。【原文：Roche on Wednesday said it planned to complete its purchase of U.S. biopharmaceutical company Poseida Therapeutics , a specialist in complex immune cell therapies to treat several types of blood cancer.】

item.title: 得益于客户维系和新合同的签订，Pluxee 第一季度收入超出预期
item.description: 法国凭手机验证码领取彩金和福利公司 Pluxee 周三公布的第一季度营业收入有机增长 12.1%，超出市场预期，主要得益于良好的净保留率和持续的新客户收购。【原文：French voucher and benefits company Pluxee reported 12.1% organic growth in its first-quarter operating revenue on Wednesday, beating market expectations, supported by a sound net retention rate and continued new client acquisitions.】

item.title: 竞争加剧，印尼电子商务公司 Bukalapak 将停止销售实物商品
item.description: 印度尼西亚电子商务公司 Bukalapak 周二表示，在东南亚最大经济体 TikTok 的 Tokopedia 和 Sea 的 Shopee 的激烈竞争中，该公司将很快停止在其市场上销售实物商品。【原文：Indonesian e-commerce firm Bukalapak said on Tuesday that it would stop selling physical items on its marketplace soon, amid tough competition from TikTok's Tokopedia and Sea's Shopee in Southeast Asia's largest economy.】

item.title: 通用汽车因霍顿变速器问题在澳大利亚面临集体诉讼
item.description: 澳大利亚律师事务所莫里斯-布莱克本（Maurice Blackburn）表示，它已对美国汽车制造商通用汽车公司（General Motors）的本地部门提起集体诉讼，指控其现已解散的通用汽车霍顿（Holden）品牌某些车型的变速箱系统存在缺陷。【原文：Australian law firm Maurice Blackburn said it had filed a class action lawsuit against U.S. carmaker General Motors' local unit, alleging the transmission systems of certain models of its now-defunct GM Holden brand were defective.】

item.title: 越南盾疲软促进出口，美国对越南贸易逆差飙升至 1100 亿美元以上
item.description: 美国最新数据显示，2024 年前 11 个月，美国对越南的贸易逆差超过 1100 亿美元，因为在越南货币兑美元汇率创纪录下跌的情况下，这个东南亚工业中心的出口增长了。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit with Vietnam exceeded $110 billion in the first 11 months of 2024, latest U.S. figures show, as exports from the Southeast Asian industrial hub grew amid a record fall of its currency against the dollar.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美元走强、收益率上升成为焦点
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 市场最容易受到特朗普关税风险的影响特朗普关税风险对市场的冲击最大
item.description: 从中国到欧洲，从加拿大到墨西哥，世界市场已经因唐纳德-特朗普承诺在不到两周后就任美国总统时提高关税而受到影响。【原文：From China to Europe, Canada to Mexico, world markets are already reeling from Donald Trump's promise to jack up tariffs when he becomes U.S. president in less than two weeks.】

item.title: 亚洲美元债券交易量增长 20%，中国交易步伐加快
item.description: 预计 2025 年亚洲美元债券发行量将比去年增长约 20%，主要原因是中国的债务交易，以及美国降息使企业更有能力发行美元债券而不是本币债务。【原文：Asian dollar bond issuance is expected to rise around 20% in 2025 over last year, driven by Chinese debt deals and as U.S. interest rate cuts make it more affordable for companies to issue dollar bonds rather than local currency debt.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪称 5000 辆新能源汽车启航欧洲
item.description: 中国汽车制造商比亚迪周三表示，第三艘运载近5000辆新能源汽车前往欧洲的滚装船已经起航。【原文：Chinese carmaker BYD said on Wednesday that a third roll-on/roll-off ship carrying close to 5,000 new energy vehicles bound for Europe has set sail.】

item.title: 中国扩大以旧换新计划以重振经济增长
item.description: 中国将更多的家电产品列入消费以旧换新计划的产品清单，并将在今年为更多的数码产品提供补贴，以努力重振低迷的家居行业需求。【原文：China added more home appliances to the list of products that can be used in its consumer trade-in scheme and will offer subsidies for additional digital goods this year, in an effort to revive demand in the sluggish household sector.】

item.title: 亚洲股市下滑，美元受美国利率前景支撑
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市走低，美元走强使日元维持在六个月低点附近，因为交易员们认为，在数据显示美国经济和劳动力市场保持稳定之后，美联储可能会缓慢降息。【原文：Asian stocks drifted lower on Wednesday, with a robust dollar keeping the yen pinned near six-month lows as traders wagered the Federal Reserve will likely be slow in cutting rates after data showed the U.S. economy and labour market remained stable.】

item.title: 轮胎制造商固特异将以 7.01 亿美元向住友橡胶出售邓禄普品牌
item.description: 固特异轮胎橡胶公司（Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co）周二表示，将以 7.01 亿美元现金向住友橡胶工业出售旗下邓禄普品牌。【原文：Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co said on Tuesday that it will sell its Dunlop brand to Sumitomo Rubber Industries for $701 million in cash.】

item.title: 澳大利亚核心通胀放缓，为 2 月降息敞开大门
item.description: 由于电费上涨，澳大利亚 11 月份的消费价格通胀率从三年来的低点回升，但核心通胀率的下降仍然为最早于下个月降息提供了支持。【原文：Australian consumer price inflation crept up from three-year lows in November as electricity costs jumped, but a drop in core inflation still bolstered the case for a cut in interest rates as early as next month.】

item.title: 欧佩克（OPEC）供应收紧、美国就业数据刺激油价上涨
item.description: 由于俄罗斯和石油输出国组织（OPEC）成员国的供应收紧，油价周三上涨，而显示美国职位空缺意外增加的数据表明，经济活动正在扩大，石油需求也随之增长。【原文：Oil prices rose on Wednesday as supplies from Russia and OPEC members tightened, while data showing an unexpected increase in U.S. jobs openings pointed to expanding economic activity and consequent growth in oil demand.】

item.title: 粉红狐狸 "丽娜贝尔 "赢得中国人的心，迪士尼利用情感经济
item.description: 每周，只要她从市场营销工作中抽出时间，就会发现 Ida Jia 在上海迪士尼乐园排上几个小时的队，只为和一只毛茸茸的粉色狐狸 Linabell（一只有着蓝色大眼睛的狐狸）待上几分钟。【原文：Each week, whenever she has time off from her marketing job, Ida Jia can be found at Shanghai Disneyland queuing for hours to spend a few minutes with Linabell, a fluffy pink fox with big blue eyes.】

item.title: 美国数据强劲，美元跟随收益率走高
item.description: 周三，在强劲的美国数据推动收益率飙升并减少了一些对美联储降息的押注之后，美元站稳了脚跟，日元则下挫至接近去年吸引干预的水平。【原文：The dollar stood tall on Wednesday and the yen sagged close to levels that drew intervention last year after strong U.S. data drove a spike in yields and pared some bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 澳大利亚人报》报道：澳大利亚 CBA 未就现金存取费问题通知监管机构
item.description: 据《澳大利亚人报》报道，澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank Australia）在将一百万客户转移到新的银行账户之前，没有正式通知该国的任何一家审慎监管机构，导致许多客户不得不通过分行支付现金。【原文：The Commonwealth Bank of Australia failed to formally notify either of the country's prudential regulators before shifting a million customers to new bank accounts, causing many to pay to access cash through branches, the Australian reported.】

item.title: 独家报道比亚迪用违规签证将数百名中国工人带到巴西--调查员
item.description: 一位重要的劳动监察员周二告诉路透社记者，电动汽车生产商比亚迪用非正规签证招来了数百名中国工人在巴西建厂。【原文：Electric vehicle producer BYD brought hundreds of Chinese workers on irregular visas to build a factory in Brazil, a key labor inspector told Reuters on Tuesday, adding the company has pledged to comply with local labor laws for the workers remaining in the country.】
